meanings.sent1: My foremothers paved the way for future generations of women.
meanings.sent2: We honor our foremothers for their strength and resilience.
meanings.sent3: The stories of our foremothers are filled with wisdom and courage.
meanings.sent4: In the tapestry of history, our foremothers are the threads that bind us together.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of our foremothers echoes through time, inspiring us to be our best selves.

meanings.definition: Women who came before in a family or lineage.
meanings.sent1: The foremothers of our clan are remembered in our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: Each generation learns from the experiences of their foremothers.
meanings.sent3: The foremothers of the past would be amazed by the technology we have today.
meanings.sent4: Like branches on a family tree, our foremothers connect us to our roots.
meanings.sent5: The footsteps of our foremothers guide us as we walk our own paths in life.
